Tyrael: I must say that my second in command was killed in action. I 
am the sole surviving officer of my unit.

He sat at the table. He was eager to know the situation back on 
Cybertron...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> Blackheart bows. "Please sit down." A black circular table was 
loacated in 
> the middle of the bridge. Each member of his crew had a seat with 
his name on 
> it, and extra seats were placed for Tyrael and his second in 
command. 
> Tyrael's name was on one of the seats. The  world map came up over 
the table. 
> "All crew members please take your positions around the table."
